boat.full_description: 10-foot gunter-rigged dinghy built in England in 1950s. Four-and-a-half foot beam. Crossed Atlantic on deck of 48-foot yawl, also an OGA member. Saved from chainsaw in late ’70s with two holes in bottom. Centerboard. Has mainsail and jib. Sails by North Sea Sails’ Steve Hall. 44 years of magic so far.
boat.name: Frith
boat.short_description: 10-foot gunter-rigged dinghy built in England in 1950s. Crossed Atlantic on deck of 48-foot yawl Klang II. Saved from chainsaw in late ’70s with two holes in bottom. Sails by North Sea Sails’ Steve Hall.
